{{cpp/string/char_traits/title|find}}
{{cpp/string/char_traits/navbar}}
{{ddcl|notes={{mark constexpr since c++17}}|
static const char_type*
    find( const char_type* ptr, std::size_t count, const char_type&amp; ch );
}}

Searches for character {{c|ch}} within the first {{c|count}} characters of the sequence pointed to by {{c|ptr}}.

See {{named req|CharTraits}} for the general requirements on character traits for {{tt|X::find}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ptr|pointer to a character string to search}}
{{par|count|the number of characters to analyze}}
{{par|ch|the character to search for}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A pointer to the first character in the range specified by {{range|ptr|ptr + count}} that compares equal to {{c|ch}}, or a null pointer if not found.

===Complexity===
Linear in {{c|count}}.
